{% endmacro %} {# Use Namespace to prevent scope issues (Duplicates Fix) #} {% set ns = namespace(current_page=[], current_height=0, all_pages=[]) %} {# Settings #} {% set max_lines = 32 %} {# Padding = 2 ensures Last Item travels with Total Row if space is tight #} {% set total_row_padding = 1 %} {% for item in doc.items %} {# 1. Calculate how many visual lines this item takes #} {% set newlines = ((item.description or "")|string).count('\n') %} {% set wraps = (((item.description or "")|length) / 50) | int %} {% set lines = 1 + newlines + wraps %} {# 2. Check if this is the VERY LAST item #} {% set effective_lines = lines %} {% if loop.last %} {# If last item, pretend it is taller to check if Total Row fits #} {% set effective_lines = lines + total_row_padding %} {% endif %} {# 3. Overflow Check #} {% if (ns.current_height + effective_lines) > max_lines %} {# Page Full: Save current page, Start new page with this item #} {% set _ = ns.all_pages.append(ns.current_page) %} {% set ns.current_page = [item] %} {% set ns.current_height = lines %} {% else %} {# Page Fits: Add item #} {% set _ = ns.current_page.append(item) %} {% set ns.current_height = ns.current_height + lines %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {# 4. Add the final leftover page #} {% if ns.current_page %} {% set _ = ns.all_pages.append(ns.current_page) %} {% endif %} {# 5. Determine if Remarks need to move to a separate page #} {# Check the height of the LAST page generated #} {% set last_page_items = ns.all_pages[-1] %} {% set ns_last = namespace(h=0) %} {% for i in last_page_items %} {% set nl = ((i.description or "")|string).count('\n') %} {% set wr = (((i.description or "")|length) / 50) | int %} {% set ns_last.h = ns_last.h + 1 + nl + wr %} {% endfor %} {# If last page + total row > 14 (approx half page), move remarks #} {% set move_remarks = (ns_last.h + total_row_padding) > 14 %} {% if doc.workflow_state == "Rejected" or doc.workflow_state != "Approved" %}
{% if doc.workflow_state != "Approved" and doc.workflow_state != "Rejected" %} NOT APPROVED {% elif doc.workflow_state == "Rejected" %} REJECTED {% endif %}
